programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 103: If Only For a Night
programme.desc: After lunch with a super fan drums up old feelings between Candace and Luvell, they plan a date that ends up being a night neither one of them will forget. Mora finally gets the date of her dream, but it ends up a nightmare.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 104: With These Vows
programme.desc: Candace's Aunt Claire comes to town with big news. Candace and Luvell attempt to keep things less complicated between them by vowing to abstain from casual sex with each other. Unfortunately Candace learns Luvell's struggle goes beyond the physical.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 105: Convenience of Comfort
programme.desc: A crazy night of bachelor and bachelorette parties for Aunt Claire and Terrence leads to some hard truths amongst the ladies and fellas.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.desc: Candace and Luvell come face to face with the true state of their relationship. Katrina's deep secret is revealed while Mora puts herself in a very compromising position.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 201: It Was All a Dream
programme.desc: Just when Candace and Luvell decide to move forward with their legal separation, a new celebrity couple threatens their brand, and a new career changing opportunity could force them together like never before. A night at the club with her new roommate and a visitor from her past has Mora dealing with unfinished business and questioning what she really wants. Katrina and Quasir struggle with the state of their tattered marriage while Quasir learns his moment with Octavia may cost him his marriage. Special appearance by Vivica A. Fox.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 202: What About Your Friends
programme.desc: Mora's high school friends make her rethink her life choices. Quasir and Katrina, helping out a friend, get caught on an awkward double date. Candace and Luvell are both introduced with opportunities to level up their individual careers, but some life changing news could change everything.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 203: All The Single Ladies
programme.desc: Luvell gives Candace a special surprise as he works to suppress resurfaced pain from their past. Travina and Lacey plan a sexy singles event that opens the door to some unlikely romances. Quasir and Katrina turn a challenge from their counselor into a competition to plan the perfect date for each other.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.desc: Mora's distraught when Carter finds out her secret, and Quasir is stressed when he finds a stranger in the house. Thanks to a special celebrity friend, Candace finally lands her new single. Tisha comes face to face with Candace and Luvell's marriage, while Terry and Blu make another attempt to steal their shine. Special appearance by Vivica A. Fox.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 205: Love Me, Or Leave Me Alone
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Luvell's dad and half brother unearths old wounds and new truths. Stephanie has to make a decision that pressures her to choose between loyalty and her heart. Fireworks spark at Candace's album release party when Luvell's brother shows up with a date. Vaughn makes a surprise appearance, and Mora finally faces Tariq. Aunt Claire also gets caught in the mix when a special guest forces her to deal with a secret from her past.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 206: Meet Me At The Altar
programme.desc: Quasir and Katrina's wedding may be in limbo when one of them struggles with "I Do." Stephanie and Simon have a heart to heart about their future. Mora is faced with a life changing decision that impacts her relationship with Carter and Candace. Candace tries to iron things out with Lacey and Greg while she and Luvell await Lana Friday's decision on her empire.

programme.desc: Dr. Draya Logan develops a selacious but exciting case study of three desperate housewives with deadly repercussions.

programme.desc: Draya tries to pry information from Gina as she falls deeper into her web of lies with Julio and Alejandro.

programme.desc: The penthouse gets more action when Syleena and Terrell introduce their masquerade parties, but not before Draya spots a guest that could jeopardize everything.

programme.desc: Still unable to break her shell, Draya dives deeper into Jordan and her many secrets.

programme.title: Hush

programme.title: Hush

programme.desc: Draya gives Mayor Dupri an ultimatum that could grant her the freedom she desires, changing everything for the women.

programme.desc: Draya is back, and trying to move on, but finds herself revisiting her past life when she gets a special visitor.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple embarks on a social test called The Experiment and are promised a chance at healing their marraiges but have no idea what to expect.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple meets their new spouse and tension is all around as it brings a different level of openness insecurity and vulnerability.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: The couples try to make the most of the process but the deeper they go the more their values and vows with their original spouses, conflict.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Things begin to heat up as they realize they were paired with the person who can give them exactly what they need at this point in their lives.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
